metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25309 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer overflow flaw was found in the Fribidi package and affects the fribidi_cap_rtl_to_unicode() function of the fribidi-char-sets-cap-rtl.c file. This flaw allows an attacker to pass a specially crafted file to the Fribidi application with the '--caprtl' option, leading to a crash and causing a denial of service.

notes.Note: rayveldkamp> For bionic affected function is in charset/fribidi-char-sets-cap-rtl.c

criterions.comment: fribidi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
